awards.text: Won 2 Primetime Emmys. Another 1 win & 7 nominations.

fullplot: The story of Eddie Slovik, who was executed by the Army in 1945, the only American soldier to be executed for desertion since the Civil War.
plot: The story of Eddie Slovik, who was executed by the Army in 1945, the only American soldier to be executed for desertion since the Civil War.
title: The Execution of Private Slovik
writers: William Bradford Huie (based on the book by)
